title: No icon for hexakill wins.
body: I have won 4 games of hexakill and was excited for an icon but never got it. Is there a reason? http://imgur.com/SAUGEP8,UquxGBj

replies.body:
Well i havent got it either, i did my 3 games yesterday like, 9 hours ago probably

Edit: 13 hours ago, lol
I'm 99% positive this happens every time new icons come out. Wait a bit.

There's usually a delay with this kind of thing; I ended up getting mine after a few hours, and I even got the puppet-mask-thing icon even though I had gifted someone last night before the event started.
